Receive four [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and four [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations of the current era each time you enter a new era. The Classical Era Dedication bonus is permanently active. Afterglow's unique building that replaces the Library. Lower cost. Cannot be pillaged by natural disasters, permanently reveals vision of tiles within 10 tiles. Additional +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points, and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each era passed since construction or last repair. +6 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to this city's garrison, and +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when this city performs a Ranged Attack.

Afterglow's unique unit that replaces the Spearman. Unlocked with 'Irrigation'. Lower cost, but higher base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and [ICON_Movement] Movement, and ignores the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength bonus melee units have against anti-cavalry units. +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for each adjacent Fellow Gang unit, +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking district defenses. +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement in friendly territory.
